## Installation

You can install the released version of virtualMEDgarden from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("virtualMEDgarden")
```

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("SMART-Research/virtualMEDgarden")
```
## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example, eval=FALSE}
library(virtualMEDgarden)
## basic example code
```
